special_abilities.name: Fey Ancestry.
descriptions: The draegloth has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put it to sleep.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
descriptions: The draegloth's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 11). The draegloth can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
1/day each: confusion, dancing lights, faerie fire

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The draegloth makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 16 (2d10+5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft, one target. Hit: 16 (2d10+5) slashing damage.
